products.title: Splash Taupe Brown Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash taupe brown roller blind in brown. Made to measure from 8.83 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their splash fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This soft brown roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories.
This roller blind with accompanying white components and brown fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window. Their roller blinds are value for money and easy to install.For ease of mind, all their products come with a 5 year guarantee, made in the heart of the yorkshire textile homeland, swift direct blinds upholds high quality products at highly-competitive online prices.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx2074 fabric colour: taupe brown material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Splash Mocha Brown Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash mocha brown roller blind in brown. Made to measure from 9.35 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash mocha brown is a soft milk coffee shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their splash mocha brown roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

products.title: Splash Taupe Brown Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash taupe brown electric roller blind in brown. Made to measure from 122.00 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their moisture-resistant splash taupe brown electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The soft light brown roller is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its calming, saturated shade. 
 
Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space, and are cordless and therefore child-safe by design.  At swift direct blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of their free 5 year guarantee, which means investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.  
 
 Product id: db-erbx2074 fabric colour: taupe brown material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Splash Mocha Brown Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash mocha brown electric roller blind in brown. Made to measure from 133.32 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their best-selling splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish which has wonderful light filtering properties. Perfect for offering privacy without completely blocking out all the light. Their splash range is also moisture resistant making it a perfect addition within for kitchens, bathrooms and en-suites. 
 
 This splash mocha brown electric roller blind will update and brighten any interior. The dark bown of the fabric will look stunning when paired with natural wooden tones and is the perfect splash of colour to compliment cool, contemporary grey shades. Their electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more dificult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space. 
 
 At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This brown roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. 
 
 Product id: db-erbx2130 fabric colour: mocha brown material: 100% polyester headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.   Control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes
